member.name: M:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions.InitializeReceiveDropboxWebHooks(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes support for receiving Dropbox WebHooks. Set the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_Dropbox' application setting to the application secrets, optionally using IDs to differentiate between multiple WebHooks, for example 'secret0, id1=secret1, id2=secret2'. The corresponding WebHook URI is of the form 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/dropbox/{id}'. For details about Dropbox WebHooks, see https://www.dropbox.com/developers/webhooks/docs.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.DropboxReceiverResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.DropboxReceiverResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.DropboxReceiverResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.DropboxReceiverResources.Receiver_BadHeaderEncoding
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The '{0}' header value is invalid. It must be a valid hex-encoded string..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.DropboxReceiverResources.Receiver_NoChallenge
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The WebHook verification request must contain a '{0}' query parameter which will get echoed back in a successful response..

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.DropboxWebHookReceiver
member.summary: Provides an implementation which supports WebHooks generated by Dropbox. Set the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_Dropbox' application setting to the application secrets, optionally using IDs to differentiate between multiple WebHooks, for example 'secret0, id1=secret1, id2=secret2'. The corresponding WebHook URI is of the form 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/dropbox/{id}'. For details about Dropbox WebHooks, see https://www.dropbox.com/developers/webhooks/docs.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.DropboxWebHookReceiver.ReceiverName
member.summary: Gets the receiver name for this receiver.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.DropboxWebHookReceiver.VerifySignature(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the signature header matches that of the actual body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.DropboxWebHookReceiver.WebHookVerification(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a response to a WebHook verification GET request.
